trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule"></xref> class.
You can use the ProfileEventArgs class during the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> event to specify a custom user profile.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用期间 ProfileEventArgs 类<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>事件指定自定义用户配置文件。</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>

trans-unit.source: If, when the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> event completes, the ProfileEventArgs parameter of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventHandler> has its <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs.Profile%2A> property set to a value that’s not `null`, then the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> uses the value of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs.Profile%2A> property in the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.
trans-unit.target: 如果是，当<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>事件完成的 ProfileEventArgs 参数<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventHandler>具有其<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs.Profile%2A>属性设置为一个值，不是`null`，然后<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule>使用<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs.Profile%2A>在当前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext>属性</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs.Profile%2A>的值</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule></xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs.Profile%2A></xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventHandler></xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs"></xref> class.

The ProfileEventArgs creates an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs> class and sets the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs.Context%2A> property to the specified <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.
trans-unit.target: ProfileEventArgs 创建<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs>类并设置<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs.Context%2A>为指定<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>。</xref:System.Web.HttpContext>属性</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs.Context%2A></xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs>的一个实例

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> of the current request.
Gets the <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> for the current request.
The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs> object provides event information to the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> event of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs>对象提供了事件信息写入<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>事件的<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule>类。</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The Context property provides access to the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> of the current request.
trans-unit.target: 上下文属性提供访问权限<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>当前请求。</xref:System.Web.HttpContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> for the current request
Gets or sets the user profile for the current request.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当前请求的用户配置文件。

trans-unit.source: You can use the Profile property during the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> event to specify a custom user profile.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用在该配置文件属性<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>事件指定自定义用户配置文件。</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>

trans-unit.source: If, when the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> event completes, the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs> parameter of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventHandler> has its Profile property set to a value that’s not `null`, then the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> uses the value of the Profile property in the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.
trans-unit.target: 如果是，当<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>事件完成后，<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs>参数<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventHandler>设置一个值，不是为其配置文件属性`null`，然后<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule>使用在当前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext>该配置文件属性的值</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule></xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventHandler></xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs></xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> does not set the Profile property for the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> event.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;><xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule>未设置的配置文件属性<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>事件。</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> only gets the value of the Profile property when the code in the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> event completes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule>仅获取配置文件属性的值时中的代码<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>事件完成。</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule>

trans-unit.source: If the Profile property is not explicitly set by application code during the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> event, the Profile property value will be `null`.
trans-unit.target: 未显式设置的配置文件属性如果由期间的应用程序代码<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>事件，配置文件属性值将为`null`。</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>

trans-unit.source: The user profile to use for the current request.
trans-unit.target: 要使用当前请求的用户配置文件。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。
